Articles.Content:
[Woops, didn't expect the other thread to be moved:////]

So I'm doing a stock(alike) Grand Tour.

Mods I'm using are the 7-man Taurus capsule, the Habitat Pack and Kerbal Alarm Clock, as well as some visual mods like HotRockets and BetterAtmospheres, etc.

The gist is to land on every celestial body that can be landed on without returning to Kerbin. I see this as something of a holy grail of KSP missions, a real elite level undertaking.

I've been streaming it so far at my twitch channel, from midnight to 4am UTC time.

I've just left Moho for Eve, so I've only just started. Is there much interest for me detailing the mission thus far, and as it progresses, or should I just leave the stream link here?

Edited June 1, 2014 by Just_Testing
